title: Cauliflower Manchurian Gravy/Gobi Manchurian Gravy
content:
Ingredients: Gobi Manchurian: Cauliflower - 1/2 All purpose flour/ Maida - 3 tb sp Corn flour - 5 tb sp Ginger +Garlic paste - 1 tb sp Garam Masala powder - 1 tb sp Red chilli powder - 1 tb sp Cumin powder/ Jeera powder - 1 tb sp Coriander powder - 1tb sp Salt - As per taste Oil - To deep fry Gravy: Finely chopped ginger - 1 tb sp Finely chopped garlic - 1 tb sp Onion chopped - 1/2 cup Spring Onions chopped - 1/2 cup Coriander chopped - 2 tb sp (optional) Corn flour - 1 tb sp Soya sauce - 1 tb sp Green chilli sauce - 1 tb sp Red chilli sauce - 1 tb sp Tomato sauce - 1 tb sp Vinegar - 1/2 tb sp Pinch of salt Procedure:
  • Wash and Chop cauliflower into small pieces and cook for 5 minutes in salted boiling water (salt - 1/2 tea spoon)
  • Meanwhile heat oil for deep fry in a pan
  • Drain water when it cooked well and remove excess water by paper napkin. Keep it aside
  • Prepare batter in a bowl by adding all purpose flour/maida, corn flour, ginger-garlic paste, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and salt to taste mix it well without any lumps
  • Make sure batter should be medium thickness
  • Dip cauliflower pieces one by one in it and coat it fully with batter
  • Drop coated cauliflower pieces with spoon in medium to high heated oil to deep fry
  • Repeat the same process till cauliflower pieces completed
  • Take out fried Gobi Manchurian on paper towel in a plate or bowl
  • Keep it aside
Gravy procedure:
  • Add oil in medium heated frying pan
  • First add chopped ginger and garlic let it fry and saute till color changes
  • Mean while prepare sauce: Take a bowl add corn flour and add water mix it well with out any lumps
  • Next add soya sauce, green chill sauce, red chilli sauce, tomato sauce and pinch of salt. Mix it well and keep aside
  • Now add chopped onions Saute till onion color changes to brownish
  • Add spring onion and stir for few seconds
  • Next add corn flour mix and saute well
  • If required add water
  • Next add fried Gobi Manchurian in pan, saute 2 minutes
  • Finally add chopped coriander and saute it. It's cooked when the gravy becomes thick and consistency decreases
  • Take out in a bowl and garnish with spring onion
  • Gobi Manchurian Gravy is ready
  • Serve it with sliced onion and lemon üçã¬†you feel awesome taste. Have it at¬†evening times/rainy season/winter
